item.title: Report X-2023070689
item.description:
Report X-2023070689

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-01
  • City: SAINT PETERS
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package arrived in load side and tipped over on its side partially spilling the powdered sodium hydroxide. The area was evacuated and the hazmat gear was put on, the spilled material was swept up and returned to the container which was placed in a lined red hazmat tote. DescribePack: The lid on the pail was not completely sealed allowing the contents to spill when it tipped over DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The product was returned to the container and the the area was cleaned prior to package handlers being allowed to return.

item.title: Report X-2023070678
item.description:
Report X-2023070678

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-01
  • City: STRAFFORD
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered while unloading the trailer around 8:45. Management and HazMat personnel were notified and package was placed in HazMat tub and taken to the HazMat cage. DescribePack: Outer packaging does not look faulty. The container that the liquid is in appeared to have a loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: release was isolated and cleaned timely

item.title: Report X-2023070680
item.description:
Report X-2023070680

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-30
  • City: KANSAS CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was recovered from the 1-3-5 Unload and placed in a lined tote. DescribePack: Two of the four containers of extract developed loosed caps which allowed for a partial leak of their contents to occur. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in the Hazmat cage on the Corrosive Pallet.

item.title: Report X-2023070661
item.description:
Report X-2023070661

  • City: SAINT PETERS
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package loading instructions were not followed and the package leaked when placed on its side. DescribePack: Two of four bottles leaked at the cap DurationRel: 6 and MitigateEffect: Neutralizing agent was spread and the package was placed in the Red Hazmat Tote (lined) Neutralizing agent was collect and place in the tote with the package

item.title: Report X-2023061311
item.description:
Report X-2023061311

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-15
  • City: EARTH CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE HAZMAT WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKING ON THE UNLOAD DOCK OF THE EARTH CITY MO UPS HUB. THE PACKAGE WAS WET ON THE BOTTOM WITH NO SPILLAGE OUTSIDE THE BOX. THE HAZMAT WAS TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP PROCESSING AREA. ALL MATERIAL HAS BEEN PROCESSED THROUGH THE UPS DAMAGED MATERIALS PROGRAM.
